quests.name: A Restaurant Makeover
objectives: Meet Remy at the Restaurant.
Enter the restaurant and see what's inside.
Talk to Remy about the restaurant.
Buy a Restaurant Furniture Kit from Scrooge.
Bring Remy the Restaurant Furniture Kit.

Find ingredients for Chez Remy:
  ‧ 10 Oregano
  ‧ 15 Carrot
  ‧ 15 Raspberry
  ‧ 25 Wheat
Bring Remy the ingredients he needs.
Follow Remy to the restaurant.
Talk to Remy
Enter the newly opened restaurant!
Talk to Remy.

quests.name: Remy's Recipe Book
objectives: Ask Mickey about Remy's Recipe Books.
Examine the list Mickey gave you.
Use Mickey's Memory to find the hidden Books.
Bring all the Books to Remy.
Go to the Ratatouille Realm to find what's missing.
Bring Remy the Bag of Peanuts.
Cook 2 meals that contain Peanuts.
Talk to Remy.
rewards: Unlock Peanuts for purchase in Chez Remy

spoilers.title: First Book's location
spoilers.objective: Mickey's Notes on Remy's Special Recipe I - Digging up a sparkling area of the ground in the Peaceful Meadow, just beside the southern stairs to Dazzle Beach

spoilers.title: Second Book's location
spoilers.objective: Mickey's Notes on Remy's Special Recipe II - Digging up a sparkling area of the ground at the bottom level of the Mystical Cave on Dazzle Beach

spoilers.title: Third Book's location
spoilers.objective: Mickey's Notes on Remy's Special Recipe III - Digging up a sparkling area of the ground on Dazzle Beach just beside the dock

quests.name: The Price of Fame
objectives: A cooking outfit. Put on the clothes Remy gave you.
Show Remy your cooking outfit for inspection.
Help Remy by serving 3 restaurant orders.
Return to Remy.

quests.name: The Unknown Flavor
objectives: Ask Merlin for help.
Find Merlin's notes in his House.
Gather 3 Purified Purified Night Shard for the recipe.
Find someone to turn the Purified Night Shard into powder.

Complete the recipe:
  ‧ 15 Snowball
  ‧ 1 Purified Night Shard Powder
Craft Ice Slush
Bring Remy the Ice Slush.
Prepare a bowl of Vanilla Ice Cream.
Return to Remy.

quests.name: A Three-Course Thank-You
objectives:
You found some Ingredients in the Forest of Valor.
  ‧ Bag of Ingredients to Remy
Cook 5-Star Meals for Merlin, Mickey, Scrooge, and Goofy

Bring 5-Star Meals to:
  ‧ Merlin
  ‧ Mickey
  ‧ Scrooge McDuck
  ‧ Goofy
Report back to Remy.

quests.name: Wrought Iron
objectives: Investigate the strange Menu in your Inventory.
Talk to Remy.

Bring Villagers some free samples to show them Chez Remy Mobile is open for business:
  ‧ Bring something made with Slush Ice to Elsa.
  ‧ Get something made with Slush Ice for Elsa.
  ‧ Bring a Dessert to Belle.
  ‧ Get a Dessert for Belle.
  ‧ Bring a meal made with fish to Nala.
  ‧ Get a meal made with fish for Nala.
  ‧ Bring a 5-Star Meal to Ariel.
  ‧ Get a 5-Star Meal for Ariel.
Return to Remy.

Craft any of the following using Wrought Iron:
  ‧ (Complete daily deliveries for Remy if you need more Wrought Iron!)
  ‧ Parisian Chair.
  ‧ Parisian Table.
  ‧ Ornate Parisian Chair.
  ‧ Ornate Parisian Table.

Decorate around Chez Remy in Dreamlight Valley with any of the following:
  ‧ Parisian Chair.
  ‧ Parisian Table.
  ‧ Ornate Parisian Chair.
  ‧ Ornate Parisian Table.
Return to Remy.

quests.name: A Taste for Literature
objectives: Head over to Chez Remy to consult about the mysterious cookbook.
Consult with Remy about the mysterious cookbook.
A Memory appeared in the restaurant! What could it depict?
Talk to Remy about what you saw in the Memory.
Talk to the Villagers from the Memory.

Gather the rest of the Ingredients for the Cajun recipe.
  ‧ Shrimp.
  ‧ Onion.
  ‧ Rice.
  ‧ Milk.
Cook the mysterious Cajun recipe.

Share the Enchanted Shrimp Étouffée with the Villagers.
  ‧ Moana.
  ‧ Mickey Mouse.
  ‧ Merlin.
  ‧ Remy.
Unlock Tiana.
Make sure you have some Enchanted Shrimp Étouffée left to share with Tiana.
Bring some of the Enchanted Shrimp Étouffée to Tiana for a taste.
Place Tiana's House in the Valley.
Interact with the Scrooge McDuck Sign to Rebuild Tiana's House.
Make sure you have the Mysterious Cajun Recipe Book in your Inventory.
Bring the Mysterious Cajun Recipe Book to Tiana for safekeeping.
